sn55.51:4.1: “Mendicants, a noble disciple who has four things is a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.
sn55.51:5.2: It’s when a noble disciple has experiential confidence in the Buddha …
sn55.51:5.7: And they have the ethical conduct loved by the noble ones …
sn55.51:5.9: A noble disciple who has these four things is a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.”
sn55.51:5.10: This is what the Buddha said.
sn55.51:5.11: Then the Holy One, the Teacher, went on to say:
